content:
I'm getting this error running the latest IG Publisher:

exception generating new IG
java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.context.BaseWorkerContext.doValidateCode(BaseWorkerContext.java:501)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.context.BaseWorkerContext.validateCode(BaseWorkerContext.java:497)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.ConfigFileConverter.convert(ConfigFileConverter.java:119)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.initialize(Publisher.java:1044)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:499)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:4865)

with this configuration for 'jurisdiction' in ig.json: "jurisdiction": "001",.
We're specifying the "international realm" for the IPS IG, and the validation is failing for this code in the http://unstats.un.org/unsd/methods/m49/m49.htm code system. I haven't gotten farther into the details than that yet.

When I try to do a $validate-code for '001' against the http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/jurisdiction value set on tx.fhir.org/r4 I'm getting: Unable to provide support for code system urn:iso:std:iso:3166:-2.

I get a similar message for a value set I have defined when using the IG Publisher
Error unmarshalling resource: Unable to provide support for code system urn:iso:std:iso:11073:10101
you can still build though, right @Rob Hausam ?
yes ok. it's related to an early conversion that doesn't matter. the terminology subsystem is not fully initialised at that point... I'm not quite sure what to do about it
